text:
Greetings, members of <#CN04R7WKE|sciml-bridged> 
The SciML ecosystem looks really interesting, and the tutorials are one of the best crafted I know of
If you don't mind, I've a few questions
1. Where does the ML fit in SciML? 
2. What are some of the applications of SciML? Are there any beginner friendly real-life projects for SciML?（Those'd make things a lot clearer）

text: Hi Chetan! If you’re looking for some real life examples to get started , have a look at this:

elements.text: Hi Chetan! If you’re looking for some real life examples to get started , have a look at this:

attachments.title: A Machine Learning-Aided Global Diagnostic and Comparative Tool to Assess Effect of Quarantine Control in COVID-19 Spread
attachments.text: We have developed a globally applicable diagnostic COVID-19 model by augmenting the classical SIR epidemiological model with a neural network module. …
attachments.fallback: A Machine Learning-Aided Global Diagnostic and Comparative Tool to Assess Effect of Quarantine Control in COVID-19 Spread
